title: Opals and Outrage
description: For Bart and Allison Allan, a vacation is just what the doctor ordered . . . literally. As agents in Interpol’s anti-terrorist organization, Anastasia, this newly married couple has battled every imaginable plot designed to undermine the American way of life, and they need some time off.But with the receipt of a harried phone call, the vacation is over. Bart and Allison learn that Islamic fundamentalists are in Idaho . . . and they aren’t here to see the sights. So buckle up, sit back, and enjoy, because this is a fast-paced, page-turning thriller that will leave you breathless.
author: Lynn Gardner
